text: Ri taqanik kubꞌij: Man katzukuj ta chi jun awixoqil o jun awachajil, man katkamisan taj, man katelaqꞌ taj, xuqujeꞌ man karayij ta ri jastaq ri man awech taj.13:9 Éxodo 20:13-15, 17; Deuteronomio 5:17-19, 21. We taqanik riꞌ kamulix xa pa jun chomabꞌal ri kubꞌij: Chaloqꞌaj ri awajil atzꞌaqat jetaq ri kabꞌan chuloqꞌaxik awibꞌ at.13:9 Levítico 19:18.
